attributes.action: Save 2 Richards Close, Harlington from being sold
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: 2 Richards Close, Harlington, Hayes, Middlesex has been in the ownership of the Wye family since first construction and forms a cornerstone of Harlington Village mentioned in the Doomsday Book. An unscrupulous property developer by the name of "Mr Tony Andrew Wye" is planning to sell the property for redevelopment. HE MUST be stopped

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
